intro: Gymnocalycium izozogsii, commonly known as the Izozog's moon cactus, is a species of cactus native to southern Africa. It is characterized by its globose, ribbed stem that is often covered in white or pale blue spines. The plant produces yellow flowers during the cooler months, typically in spring or early summer. It is a member of the Cactaceae family and is adapted to arid environments. Gymnocalycium izozogsii is relatively small, with a diameter usually not exceeding 10 centimeters.
